name: Hello Kitty
text: Hello Kitty is a sweet, kind-hearted white cat with a red bow. She loves baking and making friends.

name: My Melody
text: My Melody is a cute rabbit who always wears a pink or red hood. She enjoys baking and spending time with her friends.

name: Kuromi
text: Kuromi is a mischievous little rabbit with a jester's hat. She has a tough exterior but is quite sentimental.

name: Cinnamoroll
text: Cinnamoroll is a white puppy with long ears that help him fly. He is curious, friendly, and loves to nap.

name: Keroppi
text: Keroppi is a cheerful and adventurous frog who loves singing and making new friends. He lives in Donut Pond and enjoys spending time with his family and friends.

name: Pompompurin
text: Pompompurin is a golden retriever with a love for pudding. He is friendly, laid-back, and loves napping in his owner's shoes.

name: Badtz-Maru
text: Badtz-Maru is a naughty little penguin who dreams of greatness. He lives with his family in Gorgeoustown.
